name: WaterSlide Car Uphill Rush Pro
description:
Do you love driving water FLOATING CAR games and Water Slide on beach and oceans and in Raptide? Are floating water surfer Car racing and boating is a fun and thrill for you? If yes then get ready for WATER SLIDE & WATER SURFING In A Jet Car , FLOATING CAR , Water Sports Car and STUNT CAR on city town beach where you transform your Jet Car into floating jet sky boats and become Flip Diving Master . As a best water surfing driver race your Jet Car in immense sea with fast speed to beat all Jet Car STUNT surfers on this Tropical Island. This ultimate FUTURISTIC CARS game is best for real water boat lovers who got some amazing boat driving stunts on water simulation. In bike racing challenge as a boy rider get ready for motorbike ride on beach. While jet boat racing perform crazy stunts and Flip Diving in sea by jumping through circles. As a beach racer use your WATER SLIDE Car surfing skills to prove yourself as a King of spring racing and Flip Master.

Take control of Jet Car in Raptide to experience real water surfing Car race challenge. On this challenging and dangerous ocean your mission is to win the racing levels by beating all beach surfing Jet Car riders. As a TRAFFIC RACER you can drive your EXTREME DRIVING CAR on the beach as well as on the sea by transforming DRIVING CAR into jet sky like boat. The tyres of bike get transformed into floating tyre once you jump into ocean.

In Free mode ride your surfing CAR with full speed to collect the check points on the beach sand. To unlock new wonderful luxurious DRIVING CAR you have to win the bay race by driving floating CAR through all checkpoints.water jetting, surfer car, water surface, bike, high, water surfer, Car Floating. Become the legend of beach racing by doing stunts and jumps with extreme modern CARS! Enjoy ocean ridesIn WATER SLIDE with FLOATING CAR show your Car Stunts with STUNT CAR and enjoy WATER SURFING in this water surfer Water Sports game.

FUTURISTIC CARS TO AVAIL :

- FLOATING CAR
- Jet Car
- Water Sports
- STUNT CAR
- FUTURISTIC CARS
- Flying CARS
and many More Beach Cars in this WATER SLIDE Water Sports game For Realistic WATER SURFING.

How to Play:
- Hold the acceleration button to speed up the Jet Car
- Tap the brake button to reduce the speed 
- Press the hand break to stop STUNT CAR
- Press the nitro to give the speed boost to your FLOATING CAR and make It Flying CAR
- Tap the left arrow button to turn left
- Tap the right button to turn right
- Keep an eye on time deadLine

WATER SLIDE , WATER SURFING Game Features:

- It's Free with no internet connection required
- Futuristic Cars , Water Sports , FLOATING CAR , Jet Car and STUNT CAR for Atv rider
- Underwater CAR driving simulation
- Realistic beach and jet ski STUNT CAR Simulation And animations
- Realistic and dynamic Simulator physics
- Modern beach stunts and WATER SURFING racing simulation
- Racing And Time Challenge modes in this Futuristic Cars racing Game.
- Realistic And Futuristic water surfer with FLOATING CAR having surfer wheels

Download Now this Amazing WaterSlide Uphill Rush game.. And Have Fun...
